name: BEAST BOOST
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
// Check if Beast Boost hasn't been applied yet and if the target is dead or the target's HP is 0
if (!this._beastBoostApplied && (target.isDead() || target.hp <= 0)) {
  // Enable the Beast Boost flag
  this._beastBoostApplied = true;
  // Get the parameter ID to be boosted to be ATK
  var boostParam = 2;
  // Loop through ATK, DEF, MAT, MDF, AGI, and LUK parameters
  for (var i = 3; i < 8; ++i) {
    // Check if the looped parameter is the highest
    if (user.param(i) > user.param(boostParam)) {
      // Set the boosted parameter to the currently looped parameter
      boostParam = i;
    }
  }
  // Set the number of turns for the buff
  var turns = 4;
  // Buff the attacker
  user.addBuff(boostParam, turns);
  // Play an animation on the attacker
  user.startAnimation(119);
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: TICKLE
note:
<Custom Select Effect>
// Get the current skill
var skill = this.item();
// Check if the skill exists and can deal critical damage
if (skill && skill.damage.critical) {
  // Get the previous Critical Hit settings
  this._prevForcedCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceCritical;
  this._prevForcedNoCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceNoCritical;
  // Force the hit to be a critical hit
  BattleManager.actionForceCritical();
}
</Custom Select Effect>

name: STOCKPILE
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
// Default the stockpile stacks to 0.
user._stockpile = user._stockpile || 0;
// Increase the stockpile stack by 1
user._stockpile += 1;
// Cap the stockpile stack at 3
user._stockpile = Math.min(user._stockpile, 3);
// Update the state counter for the stockpile stack
user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._stockpile);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Set the user's stockpile stack to 0
user._stockpile = 0;
// Update the state counter for the stockpile stack
user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._stockpile);
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: FLEX
note:
<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Get the current action.
var action = user.currentAction();
// Check if the action is physical, and deals HP damage.
if (action.isPhysical() && action.isHpEffect()) {

}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Custom Confirm Effect>
// Check if the action is physical, and deals HP damage.
if (this.isPhysical() && this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  // Increase the damage by a multiplier.
  value *= 2.5;
  // Round up the damage.
  value = Math.ceil(value);
  // Remove the state.
  user.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: SECOND CHANCE
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if the party is in battle.
if ($gameParty.inBattle()) {
  // Sets the flag if the target has more than 1 HP at the time of death.
  target._secondChance = target.hp > 0;
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
// Check to see if the party is in battle, has the Second Chance flag, and if the target is dead with 0 HP.
if ($gameParty.inBattle() && target._secondChance && target.hp <= 1) {
  // Set the target's HP to 1.
  target.setHp(1);
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: MINION BARRIER
note:
<Custom Passive Condition>
// The passive effect will only be true if there's more than 1 member on the field
condition = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers().length > 1;
</Custom Passive Condition>

<Custom React Effect>
// Check if this dealt HP damage
if (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  // Get the current group of alive allies
  var allies = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
  // Calculate the amount of damage dealt spread across the allies
  var dmg = Math.ceil(value / Math.max(1, allies.length - 1));
  // Check if the number of allies is greater than 0
  if (allies.length - 1 > 0) {
    // If it is, reduce the direct damage to 0
    value = 0;
  }
  // Loop through each of the allies
  for (var i = 0; i < allies.length; ++i) {
    // Get the currently looped ally
    var ally = allies[i];
    // Check if the ally exists and isn't the target
    if (ally && ally !== target) {
      // Make the ally take damage
      ally.gainHp(-dmg);
      // Show the damage popup
      ally.result().missed = false
      ally.startDamagePopup();
      BattleManager._logWindow.displayHpDamage(ally)
      // Display an animation on that ally
      ally.startAnimation(123);
      // If the ally is dead
      if (ally.isDead()) {
        // Then make the ally collapse
        ally.performCollapse();
      }
      // Clear the ally's results
      ally.clearResult()
    }
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>
passiveConditionEval:
// The passive effect will only be true if there's more than 1 member on the field
condition = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers().length > 1;

name: SKILL ITERATION
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
// At the start of battle reset the number of casts
user._totalSpellsCasted = 0;
</Custom Battle Effect>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Default the amount of spells casted to 0
user._totalSpellsCasted = user._totalSpellsCasted || 0;
// Get the user's current action
var action = user.currentAction();
// Check if it is a skill and magical
if (action.isSkill() && action.isMagical()) {
  // Increase the total number of spells casted by 1
  user._totalSpellsCasted += 1;
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

customEffectEval.battle:
// At the start of battle reset the number of casts
user._totalSpellsCasted = 0;

name: STORMFLURRY
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
// Create empty pools for skills and skipp types.
var skills = [];
var skillTypes = [];
// Insert the skills this passive can be used with.
skills.push(112);
// Insert the skill types this passive can be used with.
skillTypes.push(1);
// Check if the action is a skill, the skill pool contain the skill or if the skill type pool contains the skill's type
if (this.isSkill() && (skills.contains(this.item().id)) || skillTypes.contains(this.item().stypeId)) {
  // Check if the target exists and has suffered HP damage
  if (target && target.result() && target.result().hpDamage > 0) {
    // Make a copy of the target's original action results
    var originalResult = JsonEx.makeDeepCopy(target._result);
    // Clear those results
    target.clearResult();
    // Calculate the extra damage
    var extraDmg = Math.ceil(0.50 * originalResult.hpDamage);
    // Calculate the success rate to deal extra damage
    var successRate = 0.75;
    // Make the number of times struck
    var struck = 0;
    // Set the maximum number of times the action can be struck
    var maxHits = 5;
    // Make a loop
    for (;;) {
      // Check if the target is alive and the action has passed the success rate
      if (target.isAlive() && Math.random() < successRate) {
        // Increase the number of times struck by 1
        struck += 1;
        // Make the target receive damage
        target.gainHp(-extraDmg);
        // Show the damage popup
        target.startDamagePopup();
        // Check if the target is dead
        if (target.isDead()) {
          // Make the target collapse
          target.performCollapse();
        }
        // Clear the target's results
        target.clearResult();
        // Check if the number of times struck has hit the maximum
        if (struck >= maxHits) {
          // If it did, break the loop
          break;
        }
      // If the extra damage success rate fails
      } else {
        // Then break the loop
        break;
      }
    }
    // If the number of times struck is greater than 0
    if (struck > 0) {
      // Then play an animation on the target
      target.startAnimation(17);
    }
    // Revert the target's results back to its original results
    target._result = originalResult;
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: Cactus
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if any physical damage is dealt.
if (value > 0 && this.isPhysical()) {
  // Sets the Recoil Rate to 15%.
  var rate = 0.15;
  // Determines the amount of recoil damage dealt.
  var recoil = value * rate;
  // Sets the DEF bonus rate to 25%.
  var rate = 0.25;
  // Determines the amount of bonus damage dealt.
  var bonus = target.def * rate;
  // Rounds up the bonus damage and recoil damage.
  var dmg = Math.ceil(bonus + recoil);
  // Makes the attacker lose damage equal to the dmg variable.
  user.gainHp(-1 * dmg);
  // Check to see if the attacker is dead.
  if (user.isDead()) {
    // If the attacker is dead, make it collapse.
    user.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: FORCE ATTACK OMORI
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
$gameTemp._storeAction = user.currentAction();
// Get the skill ID of the skill that will launch once the charging is complete.
var skill = 24;
// The target's index. -1 for random. -2 for last target.
var target = -2;
// Set the forced action for the user.
// Queue the forced action.
BattleManager.queueForceAction(user, skill, target);
if(!!$gameTemp._storeAction) {
BattleManager.queueForceScriptCall("$gameActors.actor(1)._actions = [$gameTemp._storeAction];$gameTemp._storeAction=undefined;");
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
if (value > 0 && this.isHpEffect()) {
  var mpDmg = Math.floor(value * 0.3);
  mpDmg = Math.min(mpDmg, target.mp);
  target.gainMp(-mpDmg);
  value -= mpDmg;
}
</Custom React Effect>

  mpDmg = Math.min(mpDmg, target.mp);
  target.gainMp(-mpDmg);
  value -= mpDmg;
}
</Custom React Effect>

</Custom Remove Effect>

name: TRANSFORM SOMETHING
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
// Check if the user is an enemy.
if (user.isEnemy()) {
  // Archive the previous enemy ID.
  user._prevEnemyId = user._enemyId;
  // Set the target enemy ID you want the enemy to change into.
  var transformEnemyId = 642;
  // Transform the user.
  user.transform(transformEnemyId);
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Check if the user is an enemy.
if (user.isEnemy()) {
  // Retrieve the archived enemy ID.
  var transformEnemyId = user._prevEnemyId;
  // Transform the enemy back.
  user.transform(transformEnemyId);
  // Clear the archived data.
  user._prevEnemyId = undefined;
}
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: SINGLE TARGET TAUNT (OBSERVE)
note:
<Ignore Physical Taunt>
<Ignore Magical Taunt>
<Ignore Certain Taunt>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
let AUBREY = $gameActors.actor(2);
let HERO = $gameActors.actor(3);
// Check Taunts
let isTaunt = AUBREY.isStateAffected(57) || HERO.isStateAffected(26) || HERO.isStateAffected(27)
// Get current action.
var action = user.currentAction();
// Check if action exists, for an opponent, and that the provoker isn't on the same team
if (action && action.isForOpponent() && origin.isActor() !== user.isActor() && !isTaunt) {
  action.setTarget(origin.index());
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

name: FORCE ACTION SNALEY
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
$gameTemp._storeAction = user.currentAction();
// Get the skill ID of the skill that will launch once the charging is complete.
var skill = 1488;
// The target's index. -1 for random. -2 for last target.
var target = -2;
// Set the forced action for the user.
// Queue the forced action.
BattleManager.queueForceAction(user, skill, target);
if(!!$gameTemp._storeAction) {
BattleManager.queueForceScriptCall("$gameActors.actor(3)._actions = [$gameTemp._storeAction];$gameTemp._storeAction=undefined;");
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Select Effect>
// Get the current skill
var skill = this.item();
// Check if the skill exists and can deal critical damage
if (skill && skill.damage.critical) {
  // Get the previous Critical Hit settings
  this._prevForcedCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceCritical;
  this._prevForcedNoCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceNoCritical;
  // Force the hit to be a critical hit
  BattleManager.actionForceCritical();
}
</Custom Select Effect>

name: PLOT ARMOR
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
target._secondChance = true
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
// Check to see if the party is in battle, has the Second Chance flag, and if the target is dead with 0 HP.
if ($gameParty.inBattle() && target._secondChance && target.hp <= 1) {
  // Set the target's HP to 1.
  target.setHp(1); 
  // Process Second Chance Message
  Gamefall.OmoriFixes.Process_Second_Chance_Message(target);
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

<Custom Turn End Effect>
$gameTemp._secondChance = false;
SceneManager._scene._statusWindow.refresh();
</Custom Turn End Effect>

customEffectEval.addState: target._secondChance = true
